about_the_game:
Chill out, unwind and embark on a journey in Zen Fisher to collect all unique fish species and rarities in this vast, stylized 3D open world fishing game. This indie-developed RPG features an open world with several diverse biomes, each with distinct fish species found across various lakes and caves. Zen Fisher has plenty of content, including:

  • Character progression, so you can level up your character and collect improved gear
  • 200+ unique fish species and rarities, where character progression unlocks new species and rarities. Higher fishing level and gear improve chances of finding rarer fish
  • 50+ quests with unique storylines and gameplay
  • 2 vast biomes (and more coming!) to explore in the vast open world of Zen Fisher
  • Unique real-time fishing mechanics for different types of fish, keeping content fresh and exciting
  • "Zen Fishing Mode" for those who enjoy AFKing for account progression
  • 100+ Trophies and Achievements to hunt, giving unique bonuses and items

name: Zen Fisher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Chill out, unwind and embark on a journey in Zen Fisher to collect all unique fish species and rarities in this vast, stylized 3D open world fishing game. Do you have what it takes to unlock the deepest secrets of the world?
